titleStmt.title: SII 4.544: original edition by H. Krishna Sastri
No. 544. (A.R. No. 97 of 1892). ON THE OUTSIDE OF THE FIRST PRAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE, RIGHT OF ENTRANCE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svastiśrī . tirumanni vaḷara Irunilamaṭan=taiyum porccayaṟppāvaiyuñ cīrttani(ñ)ccelviyum
tan perun=teviyarāki Inpuṟa neṭutuyi lūḻiyu ḷiṭaituṟaināṭu ntuṭarvana veli paṭa
r vanavāciyuñ cuḷḷicūḻmatiṭ kkoḷḷippākkaiyum naṇṇaṟkkarumuraṇ maṇṇaik kaṭakkamum
porukaṭa līḻattaracarta muṭiyum Āṅkavan ṟeviya roṅkeḻil muṭiyum munnavarpakkaṟ ṟennavan
vaitta cun=taramuṭiyum mintiranāramu n=tenṟicai Īḻamaṇṭalamuḻutum Eṟipaṭaikkeraḷan muṟaimaiyi
ṟ cūṭuṅ kulatanamākiya palarpukaḻmuṭiyuñ ceṅkatirmālaiyu n=taṅkatirvelait tolperuṅkāva
ṟ palapaḻan=tiyvu māpperun=taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa kopparakecari[ panma] rāna śrīrājentra- coḻadevaṟkku yāṇṭu E
ṭṭu Āvatu teṉkarai keraḷāntakavaḷaṉāṭṭu Uṟaiyūrkkūṟṟattu [śrīka]ṟkuṭi malaiviḻumiya parameśvaraṟku Innā
ṭṭu Uṟattūrkkūṟṟattuk koṭumpāḷūr Irājentracoḻa Irukkuveḷār peṇṭāṭṭi tevan peṟṟamaikkāka
Ivaḷ makaḷ colai Irāciṅkam Oru tirunon=tāviḷakkukku ney Uḻakkāl niccam Uḻakku neyyaṭṭi Iravu
m pakalum cantrātittaval Eriyavaitta cāvāmūvāp perāṭu toṇṇūṟum panmāheśvara rakṣai ..
Digital edition of SII 4.544 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
